text:
RELIGION

Sri Pundarikasha Perumal Temple, Thiruvellarai: Ratha utsavam, Perumal Thayar purappadu from kannadi arai, 5 p.m.; reaching vahana mandapam, 5.30 p.m.; purappadu in Garuda vahanam, 7.45 p.m.; reaching vahana mandapam, 8.45 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 10 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sahasranama parayanam, Thirukuralappan Sannidhi, South Gate, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 71 II Main Street, SMESC Colony, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

National Institute of Technology – Tiruchi, Society for Advancement of Electrochemical Science and Technology and CSIR – Central Electrochemical research Institute, Karaikudi: National convention of electrochemists (NCE-19), R. Easwaran, General Manager, Welding Research Institute, BHEL, inaugurates, Vijayamohanan K. Pillai, Director, CSIR – CECRI, presides, Srinivasan Sundarrajan, Director, NIT-T, delivers key-note address, Barn Hall, NIT-T campus, 9.15 a.m.

Srimad Andavan Arts and Science College: College Day, N. Gopalaswami, former Chief Election Commissioner, presides, 3 p.m.

Rotary Club of Tiruchi: R. Poonkodi, Assistant Divisional Engineer, Highways (projects), speaks on bridges, Hotel Femina, 6.30 p.m.
title: TIRUCHI today
